code: import api from'./api';export const unitsService={async getUnits(){const response=await api.get('/units');return response.data;},async createUnit(unitData){const response=await api.post('/units',unitData);return response.data;},async updateUnit(id,unitData){const response=await api.put(`/units/${id}`,unitData);return response.data;},async deleteUnit(id){const response=await api.delete(`/units/${id}`);return response.data;}};
